item.title: Detecting Brittle Decisions for Free: Leveraging Margin Consistency in Deep Robust Classifiers
item.description: Deep learning models’ robustness can be efficiently evaluated using a novel method, margin consistency, which leverages the correlation between input and logit margins for faster, accurate vulnerabili…
